page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: FARMING IN TALYBONT AREA CONTINUED The cows are out in the Summer and over the Winter they are in the sheds I have to scrape cow muck out of the sheds every morning in the Winter and give them hay and cow nuts. There is a very active Young Farmers Club at Talybont with a membership of about eighty members who attend the club every week. The highlight of the year is taking part for the club in the annual Rally. The rally was held this year at Penparc which is in the South of Ceredigion.Talybont were fortunate to be the outright winners from the 30 or so clubs taking part. The Ceredigion Rally next year will be held at Talybont and that will involve a lot of work for us young farmers of Talybont.
